file_content.text: The Promised Ones lived and died bravely. We could learn from that.
Your supervisor sent me. I found out what happened to your "Promised Ones." There's no happy ending.
I knew they couldn't have disappeared without a trace!
Give me what you found. Let us learn the history of this doomed planet, so we don't repeat it.
We're gathering artifacts from the Promised Ones. Not much yet--anything you find, bring here.
Have you spoken to Doctor Berge? He's come from the Galactic Library to run this study.
